name: Tales of contrast
description:
The first entry to the TOC series made In Scratch!

This is a platformer story game about red the protagonist trying to save his friend Stella with the help of yasha the human! Which is very uncommon in that cube world.

2 bosses in the game depending on which character you switch to before the final fight!

IMPORTANT

click on the screen to make the game load!

CONTROLS

arrow keys to move

down to crouch

click exclamation point to switch/talk

Press R to get unstuck(if that ever happens)

press"n" to skip my dialogue :( 

Press"s"to skip levels :/

press"space"to dash with certain characters
